description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. Not the usual Match3 game at all: let us introduce you to a brand new, fully original gameplay and gives you an insight about Magic Gemstones! 30 levels to play with 50 different board schemes in two different modes: our original mode and the traditional one. To unlock all the Planetary Gemstones you have to finish the game in both modes: will you succeed? Gold accounts also get LIVE High Scores!
